tasks.label: list-images
tasks.command: poetry run python wiki_tool_python/wikitool.py list-images --output-file ../Wiki-ExportFiles-data/images.txt https://absurdopedia.fandom.com

tasks.label: list-pages
tasks.command: poetry run python wiki_tool_python/wikitool.py list-pages --output-file ../Wiki-ExportFiles-data/pages.txt https://absurdopedia.fandom.com

tasks.label: list-deletedrevs
tasks.command: poetry run python wiki_tool_python/wikitool.py list-deletedrevs ../Wiki-ExportFiles-data/deletedrevs https://absurdopedia.fandom.com

tasks.label: votecount
tasks.command: poetry run python wiki_tool_python/wikitool.py --mediawiki-version 1.19 votecount --start 2018-07-12 --end 2018-10-12 --namespacefile ../data/votecount/namespaces.json http://wikireality.ru/w ../data/votecount/voters.txt > ../data/votecount/output.txt
